fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to Non Binary. This can only happen three times.
- At the end of the night, if you Non Binaried the previous day, you will see all actions that happened to you. You may prevent any actions which use the pronouns "he" or "she" in their text. You cannot prevent actions with the word "They".
- If you cancelled at least 3 actions, you will learn the name of one person whose action you prevented.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If Roleblocked, you get your charge of Non Binary back, and do not see anything that happens to you at night.
